thread.title: LeaseHawk Integrates with ResMan, the Fastest Growing Online Property Management Software Provider
thread.title_full: LeaseHawk Integrates with ResMan, the Fastest Growing Online Property Management Software Provider - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: LeaseHawk Integrates with ResMan, the Fastest Growing Online Property Management Software Provider
text:
ResMan® Online Property Management Software announces integration with LeaseHawk, a cutting edge multifamily communications platform.
Plano, Texas
ResMan®, the leader in online property management software has announced an integration with LeaseHawk, a provider of a cutting edge communications platform that empowers property marketing teams, including call tracking and dynamic analytics. The partnership features seamless workflow between two user centric platforms that promote efficient leasing and property management processes.
LeaseHawk's multi-channel communications enables leasing professionals to communicate and engage with prospects not only from their desktop, but also mobile devices. Key platform features include the Relationship Management App and ACE, which stands for “Answer Calls Every time.” The App automatically tracks every inbound and outbound form of communication, including calls, texts and emails for an entirely new way of analyzing traffic, activity and leasing success. ACE, the automated conversational assistant with a Siri-like interface, provides leasing information, schedules appointments and collects customer information when staff is unavailable, creating a modern and affordable alternative to traditional call centers.
“This integration allows our mutual clients to easily push guest cards into ResMan from the App and enable ACE to utilize pricing and availability data to answer callers questions. The integration ultimately eliminates duplicate or manual data entry which also improves accuracy,” states Mike Cornell, LeaseHawk Chief Product Officer.
“We are committed to serving our partners through integrations with organizations who share our dedication to Service First and our vision of intuitive property management software . Our partnership with LeaseHawk will help our property managers elevate response time, engagement, and results through their exceptional Relationship Management App and automated call assistant. We are thrilled about this partnership,” states Nick Olsen, Senior Software Architect.
About ResMan
ResMan provides cloud-based property management tools that enhance productivity and profitability of multifamily housing operators and owners. The SaaS provider focuses on Service First in everything, with intuitive software and industry’s leading customer experience. ResMan offers solutions for conventional multifamily and student housing providers, as well as on open API actively promoting a best-of-breed solution to meet each customer’s unique needs. To learn more, call us at (855) 737-6261.
About LeaseHawk
At LeaseHawk, our focus is to bring emerging technologies to the multifamily industry. Our communications platform empowers you with insight to elevate the key aspects of your business — your marketing, your people and your results. The multi-channel platform combines phone, email, text and speech recognition into a mobile application that enables leasing professionals to personally engage with prospects on a whole new level from not just their desktop, but any mobile device. LeaseHawk is responsible for tracking and monitoring millions of dollars in leasing opportunities every year by processing over 13 million calls and identifying over 2.7 million prospects annually. For more information call (800) 485-8430.
